Title: Mesa Verde- Far View House
Creator: Poley, H. S. (Horace Swartley)
Summary: View of men standing on ancient Native American (Anasazi) mesa-top ruins, Chapin Mesa, Mesa Verde National Park, Montezuma County, Colorado. Men, some holding wooden handled tools, stand near and on the ruins of Far View House. An unhitched wagon with a wooden barrel in it stands near the ruins; on the other side stands an automobile.
Description: 1 photonegative : glass ; 10 x 13 cm. (4 x 5 in.); 1 photoprint ; 5 x 8 cm. (2 x 3 in.)
Is Part Of: C Photo Collection 37. H. S. Poley collection.
Type of Material: Glass negatives.; Photographic prints.; Imaged.; Image
